acceptOwnership().details: The new owner accepts the ownership transfer.

params.accessControlManager_: Address of the access control manager contract

returns._0: Price in USD from Chainlink or a manually set price for the asset

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

pendingOwner().details: Returns the address of the pending owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setAccessControlManager(address).details: Admin function to set address of AccessControlManager

params.accessControlManager_: The new address of the AccessControlManager

setTokenConfig((address,address,uint32,a.custom:error: NotNullAddress error is thrown if asset address is nullNotNullAddress error is thrown if token feed address is nullRange error is thrown if twap duration of token is not greater than zero
setTokenConfig((address,address,uint32,a.custom:event: Emits TokenConfigAdded event on succesfully setting of the token config

setTokenConfigs((address,address,uint32,.custom:error: Zero length error thrown, if length of the array in parameter is 0

transferOwnership(address).details: Starts the ownership transfer of the contract to a new account. Replaces the pending transfer if there is one. Can only be called by the current owner.

InvalidDuration().notice: Thrown if the duration is invalid

Unauthorized(address,address,string).notice: Thrown when the action is prohibited by AccessControlManager

ZeroAddressNotAllowed().notice: Thrown if the supplied address is a zero address where it is not allowed

ZeroValueNotAllowed().notice: Thrown if the supplied value is 0 where it is not allowed

NewAccessControlManager(address,address).notice: Emitted when access control manager contract address is changed

TokenConfigAdded(address,address,uint32).notice: Emit when a token config is added

accessControlManager().notice: Returns the address of the access control manager contract

constructor.notice: Initializes the owner of the contract

getPrice(address).notice: Gets the price of a asset from the chainlink oracle

setTokenConfig((address,address,uint32,a.notice: Add single token config. asset & feed cannot be null addresses and maxStalePeriod must be positive

setTokenConfigs((address,address,uint32,.notice: Add multiple token configs at the same time

userdoc.notice: This oracle fetches the price of a pendle token
